name: The dumbest thing I have ever made
name_original: The dumbest thing I have ever made
description:
GARENTEED TO MAKE YOU LOSE BRAINCELLS OR YOUR MONEY BACK!!

Something I decided to make because I was bored. Programing is actually really fun.

The music in this mistake was ripped from NDS games (Trauma Center UTK2 and The World Ends With You), made by TheJPaulMusic on YT, and AI generated in Melobytes.

I'm still working on new stuff in this game. But this is what I got so far. I plan to make 3 more chapters. I'll work on this mistake when I feel like it.
